title: In regard to other Institutional Buildings covered under Regulation (2) (IV) (17) (g), Govt
clause_text: In regard to other Institutional Buildings covered under Regulation (2) (IV) (17) (g), Govt. /Municipal Commissioner may from time to time specify terms and conditions. Additional BUA beyond Zonal (basic) FSI shall be utilized for bonafide medical purpose only.

source_pdf.text_snippet: In regard to other Institutional Buildings covered under Regulation (2) (IV) (17) (g), Govt. /Municipal Commissioner may from time to time specify terms and conditions.
